title: Balangan Beach Break (Half-day)
overview: Enjoy golden sands, surfing, and cliff-top views at this quiet beach.

stops.description: Arrive and relax on the sand or try surfing.
Enjoy a drink or snack with panoramic views.

title: Balangan Surf & Relax (Full-day)
overview: A full day of surfing, sunbathing, and cliffside relaxation at Balangan Beach.

stops.description: Surf or relax on the quiet sands.
Lunch with a view of the ocean and surfers.
